title: Improving molecular imaging using a deep learning approach

title_detail.value: Improving molecular imaging using a deep learning approach

summary: Generating comprehensive molecular images of organs and tumors in living organisms can be performed at ultra-fast speed using a new deep learning approach to image reconstruction.

summary_detail.value: Generating comprehensive molecular images of organs and tumors in living organisms can be performed at ultra-fast speed using a new deep learning approach to image reconstruction.
